desc: Shop Java Junction subscription boxes are now available. Each month we pick two of our favorites and ship them to you. We also have a selection of individual roasts including organic roasts, dark roasts, light roasts, flavored roasts, seasonal roasts, and holiday flavors. We are based in Strasburg Pennsylvania.

layout.text: COFFEE DELIVERED DIRECTLY TO YOUR DOOR

Now you will never have to wonder, do I have coffee? Java Junction subscription boxes are available. Each month we pick two of our favorites and ship them to you. As a subscriber you will also receive exclusive items including new blends, recipes, sweet treats and Java Junction Now I Can Function merchandise. So what are you waiting for?
